alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Halifax; Nash (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 8:34PM EST until January 14 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... Neuse River Near Clayton affecting Johnston County. Neuse River At Smithfield affecting Johnston County. Fishing Creek At Enfield affecting Halifax, Edgecombe and Nash Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Carolina... Tar River At Tarboro affecting Edgecombe County. Lower Roanoke River At Roanoke Rapids affecting Halifax and Northampton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fishing Creek at Enfield. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. Minor overflow occurs on both banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM EST Saturday the stage was 16.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 14.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM EST Saturday was 16.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage after midnight tonight and continue falling to 5.9 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Fishing Creek Enfield 16.0 16.1 Sat 8 pm EST 14.3 13.6 13.3 8.4 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rah/rivers. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 845 AM EST.
